using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc;
using Microsoft.Extensions.Logging;
using Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization;

namespace UsersWithFriends.Services
{
    public interface IUserPivotsService
    {
        ServiceResponse<List<User>> GetUsersOfFriend(int friendId);
        ServiceResponse<List<User>> GetFriendsOfUser(int userId);
        ServiceResponse Assign(int userId, int friendId);
        ServiceResponse Remove(int userId, int friendId);
    }
}
